headline: Freedom Capital Markets Maintains Hold Rating on Pepsi Amid Modest Growth Outlook
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the best dividend stocks to buy. On October 23, Freedom Capital Markets downgraded Pepsi to Hold from Buy, while also trimming its price target from $170 to $164. Freedom Capital sees a modest upside potential of 7%. The rating update came in light of Pepsi’s Q3 fiscal 2025 results, […]

headline: United States Probiotics Market Research Report 2025-2033: Increased Consumer Awareness of Gut Health, and Innovation in Food and Beverage Applications Bolster Growth
summary: The United States probiotics market is projected to surge from $26.65 billion in 2024 to $71.8 billion by 2033, propelled by an 11.64% CAGR. Growing health consciousness and interest in natural supplements drive this expansion. Probiotics, comprised of beneficial bacteria and yeasts, are consumed primarily through fermented foods and supplements. The recognition of gut microbiome benefits has heightened demand. Key growth drivers include consumer awareness of gut health and innovation in probiot

headline: Breakfast Cereals Market Report 2025: Key Players Analysis Recent Developments, Company Strategies, Sustainability Benchmarking, Product Launches, Key Persons, and Revenue Forecasts 2024-2033
summary: The global breakfast cereals market is set for dynamic growth, projected to reach US$ 95.32 Billion by 2033 from US$ 65.25 Billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 4.30%. This surge is fueled by shifting consumer lifestyles, heightened health focus, and the demand for convenience, particularly in ready-to-eat and hot cereal segments.
